restaurants.name: Asha's Riyadh Gallery
restaurants.address: King Fahd, Riyadh 12262, Saudi Arabia Ø§Ù„Ù…Ù„Ùƒ ÙÙ‡Ø¯ØŒ Ø§Ù„Ø±ÙŠØ§Ø¶ 12262ØŒ Riyadh 12262, Saudi Arabia

reviews.name: homam aloul
reviews.comments: Even when I went late at night before the closing, the staff was so cheerful and helpful as if it was midday. I was served by Asad. I was really comfortable with his guidance through the menu and his service. The food is really good and I like the level of spices. It's not my first time and it won't be the last for sure. Two thumps up for the great service team. They are the key for the success.

reviews.name: Nora M
reviews.comments: Loved the food, it was so delicious. I especially loved the strawberry passion fruit drink. So yummy. Itâ€™s a great place to eat and dine with friends and family.

reviews.name: Nausheen Khan
reviews.comments: The best place to eat in Riyadh gallery mall. Delicious food. Courteous staff. Love it. Highly recommended.

restaurants.name: Red Chilli Restaurant
restaurants.address: Prince Abdulrahman Bin Abdulaziz St, Opposite Crowne Plaza Riyadh PalaceØŒ Riyadh 12628, Saudi Arabia

reviews.name: Athar Ali Sayed
reviews.comments: Nice place for Indian food. Reasonable price and good taste of food. Varieties to choose on the menu.

reviews.name: ED DOAL
reviews.comments: Just Awesome.. Try Malai Boti, Fish kabab. Veg rice. Butter chicken.

reviews.name: Mohammed Amro Hadi
reviews.comments: Indian style restaurant with over rated prices, food is not amazing just normal what you get to see in other Indian restaurants at much cheaper price. Not happy with the quantity as well for the price they charge.  Biryani is okay, and in mix girll platter more or less everything tastes the same.  They need to maintain proper air conditioning as sometimes the place gets really hot during peak summer and poor lit cabins in family section, dark ambience. place is good for only one time visit.

restaurants.name: Nozomi
restaurants.address: Musad Bin JalawiØŒ As Sulimaniyah, Riyadh 12244, Saudi Arabia

reviews.name: SAHAR M
reviews.comments: Visit this place, you won't regret! I would love to come back again! A bit  pricey, but it's worth it! Friendly staff and good music.

reviews.name: Ibrahim Yahea
reviews.comments: Always fresh, services are friendly and attentive and reasonable price. The atmosphere, cozy and relaxing. Never feel rushed when dining here. What's better than that? Always a wonderful experience. Can't wait till our next visit.

reviews.name: Carlos Manjarres
reviews.comments: background music.  So lets say that the quality of the food and the experience is awesome. However I my humble opinion, is absolutely overpriced. I will not pay again for a dish and a drink 10 times a regular dish in Riyadh. Is crazy. Not to mention that if you go alone..the chances of interacting with others is zero due to... you know. So. Is not worthy.

reviews.comments: Not bad..chicken a little tough..free refills tho which is really good.

restaurants.name: Lusin
restaurants.address: Prince Muhammad Bin Abdulaziz Rd, Centria Mall Olaya Street intersection withØŒ Riyadh Saudi Arabia

reviews.name: ABDULLAH ALNAIM
reviews.comments: It is such a nice restaurant, and taste is okay. It is really pricey. Sometimes, you are looking to find out and change your mood. You can choose this restaurant. I think you need to be prepared to cost invoice at the end ğŸ˜‚. I recommend to you to visit it once for your Entire Live. Enjoy

reviews.name: Alejandro VÃ¡zquez R.
reviews.comments: Yesterday me and my guests had a reservation for dinner, we arrived punctually and we were attended promptly escorted to a nice table. The attention was fast and precise, the food superb.  Then the waiter brought us wet napkins, no body asked us for coffee or dessert and equally fast we received the check without asking for it!!! We commented this facts and I felt we were swept out the place!!! I even made the comment that groups that arrived before and a couple of ladies that arrived simultaneously were still enjoying at their table while we were walking out the place. Is this how you make the place productive? Are we expats uncomfortable to you? (We were westerners appropriately dressed for the occasion).

reviews.name: Saif Abdulaziz
reviews.comments: The restaurant is magnificent, exquisite and exceptional ambience. It has a very satisfying buffet, friendly staff and romantic environment. A must visit - we surely will go back and visit it again, whenever we'll travel to Riyadh.
